data.text: @MrPeteGriff  Hi Peter, you can purchase a Same Day Standby at the airport. As a standby customer, your seat is not guaranteed and should you not be able to get on to a flight on that day, you'd have to pay TT$ 50 to change the date on the ticket. We hope this helps.
iambonner Hi there, were you able to contact us make the changes to your reservation?

@Yes_ItsTio Hi there, we're so sorry to hear you had that experience and we'd love to assist. Could you kindly submit this to our Customer Relations Team and we'll get back to you: https://t.co/wZOQrdB3ts.

The wait is over...now you can fly with us direct to Trinidad, 2x weekly on Mondays & Fridays starting 2nd August*. Book now at https://t.co/L63tZ4SDzd. Take advantage of our introductory round-trip fare starting at US$233 (tax incl.)!  #thecaribbeanidentity #iflycaribbean https://t.co/wMI69OxTxS
